mapper.select: SELECT u.name, b.id, b.building_num, b.floor, b.doorplate, em.reading AS previousReading,em.available_limit AS availableLimit FROM ( SELECT em.id, em.user_id, em.building_id, em.reading, em.time, em.available_limit, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY em.user_id ORDER BY em.time DESC) AS rn FROM electricity_meter em JOIN user ON em.user_id = user.id AND user.deleted = 0 WHERE em.time BETWEEN #{lastMonth} AND #{now} ) em JOIN user u ON u.id = em.user_id AND u.deleted = 0 JOIN building b ON em.building_id = b.id WHERE em.rn = 1 ORDER BY u.building_id
SELECT user_id FROM ( SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY user_id ORDER BY time DESC) AS rn FROM electricity_meter) AS subquery WHERE rn = 1 AND 50 >= subquery.available_limit;
